meanings.definition: To produce milk from the mammary glands.
meanings.sent1: The cow lactated to feed her calf.
meanings.sent2: The new mother lactated to nourish her baby.
meanings.sent3: The lactating goat seemed to have a never-ending supply of milk.
meanings.sent4: The lactating cat's nurturing nature was evident in her actions.
meanings.sent5: The image of the lactating mother symbolized abundance and care.

meanings.definition: To secrete milk from the mammary glands.
meanings.sent1: She lactated to provide sustenance for her newborn.
meanings.sent2: The nursing dog lactated to feed her puppies.
meanings.sent3: The lactating elephant sprayed milk everywhere when startled.
meanings.sent4: The lactating sow's milk flowed freely for her piglets.
meanings.sent5: The act of lactating is a natural process for many mammals.
